publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3310 Angela Constance: Livingston Rugby Club Celebrates its 40th Anniversary—That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution made to rugby through the determined endeavours of members of the Livingston Rugby Club over the last 40 years in promoting and popularising the game and commends the club for its support and involvement in introducing the sport to schools in Livingston.

S3M-3310 Angela Constance: Livingston Rugby Club Celebrates its 40th Anniversary—That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution made to rugby through the determined endeavours of members of the Livingston Rugby Club over the last 40 years in promoting and popularising the game and commends the club for its support and involvement in introducing the sport to schools in Livingston. Supported by: Michael Matheson*
S3M-3310 Livingston Rugby Club Celebrates its 40th Anniversary (lodged on 26 January 2009) Christine Grahame*
